Text:
Hey, you can believe whatever you want to, and post whatever you please, but could you PLEASE stop posting these in Video > Movies??

They're NOT movies, and belong in TV where people who want them can find them.  And even though I'm not d/ling any of this, thanks for posting it for those that can't see it otherwise.
Hey Goat*, Take a look at the new Hate Crimes Bill and consider how that might apply to your little note.  As you do, enjoy the few negative years remaining for your free will's function.
